div.ab:
المسيّر إلى ساحل القصير إلى شونة أبو مفرّج للشّيخ تاپع بالغ تالغ نابع والفقيه
عثمان سبعة وعشرين إردب قمح وسبع براني مراني زيت حار
وعشر سلبات والمسلّم علي بن عدّال بتأريخ الرّابع عشر
من صفر سنة ثلاث وثلاثين وستّمائة ويكون المولا يعلم أن الفقيه عثمن
الغلّة لي وله وفي حملتها حملتها المسيّر منّا للفقيه عثمن في من ذلك
اها

ăl musayyaru ʾilà sāḥili ăl quṣayri ʾilà šūnaẗi ʾabū mufarriǧ:in li š šayḫi bāliġ:in nābiġ:in nābiʿ:in tāliġ:in wa ăl faqīhi
ʿuṯmāna sabʿaẗ:un wa ʿišrīna ʾirdabba qamḥ:in wa sabʿu barānī marānī zayt:in ḥārr:in
wa ʿašru salabāt:in wa ăl musallamu musallimu ʿaliyyu bnu ʿaddāla bi taʾrīḫi ăr rābiʿa ʿašara
min ṣafar:in sanaẗa ṯalāṯ:in wa ṯalāṯīna wa sitti miʾaẗ:in wa yakūni ăl mawlā yaʿlamu ʾanna ăl faqīha ʿuṯmāna
*** ăl ġallaẗ *** l ī wa la hu wa fī ḥimlati ǧumlati hā ăl musayyaru min nā li l faqīhi ʿuṯmāna fī min ḏālika
*** ***ʾ hā ***

To be dispatched to the shore of Quseir, the warehouse of Abū Mufarrij, for Shaykh Nābiġ and the jurist To be dispatched to the shore of Quseir, the warehouse of Abū Mufarrij, for Shaykh Nābigh (?) and the jurist
ʿUthmān [are as follows]: twenty-seven irdabbs of wheat, seven bottles (barnīya) of lighting oil (zayt ḥārr), ʿUthmān [are]: twenty-seven irdabbs of wheat, seven bottles of lighting oil,
and ten hawsers. He who is to receive it for safekeeping is ʿAlī ibn ʿAddāl. On the 14th, and ten hawsers (salabāt). He who is to receive it for safekeeping (al-musallam) is ʿAlī ibn ʿAddāl. On the 14th,
the month of Ṣafar, the year 633. Let the Master (al-mawlā) know that the jurist ʿUthmān the month of Ṣafar, the year six hundred and thirty-three. The Master should know that the jurist ʿUthmān
[...] the grains (al-ghalla) [.....] for me and for him; and among its total sum is the [present] dispatched shipment from us to the jurist. And in this regard [...] [...] the grains [.....] for me and for him; and among its total sum is the [present] dispatched shipment from us to the jurist. And in this regard [...]
[..................] its [.................]
